title: White-Label Digital Patient Experience
summary: Custom-branded mobile applications (iOS/Android) and web portals that extend clinic branding while leveraging Umami's backend infrastructure, enabling telemedicine and patient engagement.
description:
Custom-branded mobile applications (iOS/Android) and web portals that extend clinic branding while leveraging Umami's backend infrastructure, enabling telemedicine and patient engagement.

## Technical Architecture Components

- React Native framework for cross-platform apps
- WebRTC media server (Jitsi/Twilio)
- Push notification service (FCM/APNS)
- CDN for content delivery (Cloudflare)
- Backend-as-a-Service (BaaS) API layer
- Analytics platform (Firebase/Mixpanel)

## Implementation Timeline

**Week 1:**
- Requirements workshop and brand asset collection

**Week 2-4:**
- Mobile app development and testing

**Week 5:**
- App Store submission and review

**Week 6:**
- Launch with marketing support

## Case Study Reference

**Pediatric Clinic, Miami**

- **Challenge:** Low engagement, difficult telehealth scheduling
- **Outcome:** 5,000+ downloads in month 1, 40% increase in telehealth utilization
